recommendations: Barry Hoffmann
Business Process | Business Applications Specialist | Operations | Customer Success | Technical Support | Executive
June 5, 2017, Rob worked with Barry in the same group

Rob and I worked together for several years at K2, where he managed the international consulting services arm of the business. Rob is brilliant at combining analytics with business, turning chaos into structure and deconstructing complex business problems into simple to comprehend flow of work.Rob is a strong innovator and great negotiator that leads with energy, enthusiasm and action.Rob was not only a colleague but also a mentor. He generously shared a multitude of knowledge from his experience in operations, business growth and management of multi-regional teams. He played a big role in my growth as a leader in this company. One of the key points that always stood out for me was his ability to take an idea from plan to execution in short periods of time and his ability to always see and work towards the bigger picture. I miss having him around to share ideas and work through complex business problems.

October 26, 2017, Rob managed Eugene directly

I worked with Eugene for about 4 years as part of K2 Software (SourceCode).  His expertise with our forms technology was instrumental toward our Services team success on our most challenging projects.  Clients love him and his teammates love his pleasant, friendly and helpful demeanor.  Over years, he honed his skills as a solution developer and eventually moved into the product development team. Eugene is a solid professional technologist who's a pleasure to work with.  He's thoughtful, creative and an excellent team player.  I highly recommend him.

Barry Hoffmann
Business Process | Business Applications Specialist | Operations | Customer Success | Technical Support | Executive
May 22, 2017, Barry worked with Rob in the same group

I had the pleasure of working alongside Barry for four years with K2 from 2012-2016.  As head of the global support organization, Barry proved to be a masterful leader and operational manager.  His knowledge of the product; the strategic direction of the business; and customer experience needs earned him unwavering respect by his team.  He brought increasing innovation and maturity to his team over the years I worked with him, particularly with his use of performance data to balance support loads.  As a person, I couldn’t have worked with a more affable and enjoyable colleague.  His intelligence, integrity, positive-attitude and creativity have all contributed to his success.  I wholeheartedly endorse and recommend Barry.

summary: Accomplished software industry business executive having particular depth with process excellence technologies.  Expert with turnarounds, start-ups, and early stage, fast-growth operations.  Maintains a balance of leadership, strategy development, and operational execution abilities with most recent focus on software development, software services, marketing and sales efforts.  Stellar track record of exceeding revenue and margin targets; running global operations in the UK, EMEA, and Asia; with an ability to manage executive relationships and high value deal negotiations.  Successful negotiation and execution of 3 merger and acquisition deals involving a public company, venture capital investment and a private merger.Specialties include: early stage, high growth operations; corporate strategy; business transformation; mergers & acquisitions; quality, governance, compliance, risk, performance and sustainability. Background in financial analysis, investment research, portfolio management and investment management.
name: Rob Speck
title: Founder, CEO at Quogent
